description:
Dr. Bronner’s has been doing it right for decades. What’s "it" you ask? In this case, the answer is a natural lavender-scented soap that’ll clean anything from your face to your floor. Just dilute a few drops on a wet cloth and get ready to feel fresh and clean.Made with organic and certified fair trade ingredients.Biodegradable.Bottle is made from 100% recycled materials.Concentrated.

        Sustainability






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade








Organic








                      Organically grown content
name: Dr. Bronner's Pure-Castile Lavender Liquid Soap 59ml
